title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Health Updates: red meat increases woman’s risk of stroke; thimerosal, vaccines & Autism; are government funded... <!--more--> drug trials safe?
; probiotics.
Commentaries: “Tweeting away the time” [Ralph Nader 4Jan11 www.
counterpunch]; engaging to help the poor.
Conversations With Remarkable Minds Jim Garrison is the co-founder and president of Wisdom University, San Francisco & co-founder of the State of the World Forum, now dedicated to tackling the environmental & social problems related to climate change & global warming; his books include “Civilization and the Transformation of Power” and “America as Empire: Global Leader or Rogue Nation”.
  Climate change policy failures in 2010, global warming challenges in 2011; signs of climate change; eco-politics; our capacity to re-align with Gaia will determine how long we survive; resilient communities, transition towns, sustainability.
www.WisdomUniversity.org  www.WorldForum.org
